room_title: Escape room "Egyptian Heist" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
review: We used two rooms with our large family group during our recent trip to CO Springs. The rooms were both well thought out and challenging for escape room newbies as well as veterans. We would absolutely return to take on the remaining rooms. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Egyptian Heist" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
review: Great room, well thought out. We attend MANY escape rooms per month, and we will be back to Mystery-Quests!

room_title: Escape room "Egyptian Heist" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
review: Amazing experience. We did the Egyptian Heist. Well put together and challenging. We will definitely be doing this again. Can't wait to do the other rooms!
